author: felicity
msg: If you change the content-type or content-description of
the mime encapsulated spam mail part, you need to change it in
remove_spamassassin_markup as well.  We don't have any other tell-tale
markup saying it's an encapsulated message, so the code keys in on the
Added a private configuration setting in SpamAssassin.pm which lets us
change the description in one place and have it used in (de)encapsulation.

author: jmason
msg: MIME-part encapsulation mods.  now adds a Received line; use_terse_report is defaulted to 0 again, since otherwise there'll be a flood of newbie reports, as there's no explanation of what SA is; abstracted the 'unsafe for viewing' msg to conf file so it can be i18n'd.

author: felicity
msg: Make sure that report_as_spam (called for 'spamassassin -r') cleans the
